sqlMap.select: SELECT P.EMP_NAME, M.CODE_NAME AS POSITION, P.EMP_NUM, C.CODE_NAME AS OFFICE FROM EMP P LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT * FROM CODEDATA WHERE BIG='8')M ON P.POSITION_CODE = M.SMALL LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT * FROM CODEDATA WHERE BIG='9')C ON P.OFFICE_CODE = C.SMALL WHERE 1=1 AND P.EMP_NUM = #EMP_NUM#

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS NO, ROWNO,DAILY_NUM, RECODE_DATE, CONTENT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO,DAILY_NUM, RECODE_DATE,CONTENT FROM(SELECT DAILY_NUM,TO_CHAR(RECORD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RECODE_DATE, CONTENT FROM DAILY WHERE EMP_NUM = #EMP_NUM# AND HOSPITAL_CODE = #HOSPITAL_CODE# ORDER BY RECODE_DATE) ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)) WHERE 1 = 1 AND NO BETWEEN #start# AND #end#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM DAILY WHERE 1=1
SELECT DAILY_NUM, TO_CHAR(RECORD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RDATE, EMP_NUM, HOSPITAL_CODE,CONTENT FROM DAILY WHERE 1=1 AND DAILY_NUM = #TURN#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE DAILY SET RECORD_DATE = #records#, CONTENT = #contents# WHERE DAILY_NUM = #TURN#
